mapper.select: SELECT t1.id as id, t1.message_id as message_id, t1.receiver_id as receiver_id, t1.handler_id as handler_id, t1.audit_status as audit_status FROM t_wf_doc_audit_message_receiver t1 INNER JOIN t_wf_doc_audit_message t2 ON t1.message_id=t2.id WHERE t2.proc_inst_id=#{procInstId} AND t1.audit_status IN ('', 'pending')
